item.title: My first Mac
item.description: After having a permission of my parents to buy a new laptop, I was entangled with two types: Lenovo Ideapad Legion Y540-15 and A2159 Macbook-Pro 2019. Finally I chose my dreaming mpb for the convenience of building coding environments and helping me quit the gaming addiction(maybe). With the discount at the school starting time from Apple, I’ve got my treasure 13' Macbook-Pro 2019 wih 2 thunderbolt 3 ports/Ram:16GB/Memory:512GB with ï¿¥
